forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 21, with temperatures rising to around 26 overnight. West northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Veterans Day
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 10pm, then a chance of freezing rain between 10pm and 11pm, then a chance of snow between 11pm and 4am, then a slight chance of rain and snow. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 46. West wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
